name: Turboden
goal:
Turboden is a leading company in the development and production of ORC (Organic Rankine Cycle) turbogenerators for the combined generation of heat and power from renewable sources (biomass, geothermal, solar) and heat recovery from industrial processes.
Founded in 1980, Turboden has been part of the Mitsubishi Heavy Industries group since 2013.
So far Turboden has installed more than 350 plants worldwide.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Energy Union, 2030 Framework for climate and energy policies, ETS, Circular Economy, Energy Winter Package.
